sentence.Network_en: Magda heard him out, smiled tacitly with peasant slyness.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛格达听出了话里的意思, 带着庄稼人的调皮神情沉默地微笑.

sentence.Network_en: Dr. Middleton balanced himself, and with an air of benevolent slyness.
sentence.Network_cn: 弥得尔顿博士以慈悲为怀的神气闪烁其辞地把话又说回来.

sentence.Network_en: But at my last words he perked up into a kind of startled slyness.
sentence.Network_cn: 但听了我最后那句话,他立刻抬起头来,露出了吃惊和狡猾的神情.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Black Cat －黑猫 ... hold……in awe 对……敬畏 slyness 狡诈 shrewdness 精明.
考研英语贬义词词汇汇总_新东方在线 ... immorality 不道德 slyness 狡猾 fox 狡猾的人.
Sincerity should not be reduced to hypocrisy and wit slyness ., 关怀不该沦为伪善 , 睿智不该沦为狡猾.

means.word_mean: 1. shrewdness as demonstrated by being skilled in deception
